name: Red Kite
overview:
Red Kite provide IT Support and Systems Integhration services to SME’s in the Herts,Bucks,Beds and Oxfordshire areas.

By ensuring we offer IT Solutions that assist our customers in dealing with real business drivers, the return on investment is always easily measurable. We creat calm out of chaos with the perfect combination of people and technology. Our people and your technology work in total harmony to drive your business forward.

Itâ€™s our people who make Red Kite special and ensure our solutions work for you. We make sure we give you tangible improvements to the performance of your business.

We work with you to build the perfect team for your project. Our staff have a wealth of experience in various industries. It is their skills and experiance which means that every promise is kept and every target achieved.

We create solutions tailored to your own business needs. And because we know that a winning team relies on powerful support, our development, installation and customer service teams are second to none. They respond quickly and efficiently to every request every time.
